title: Cundill Prize-winner Camilla Townsend on global history
itunes:title: Cundill Prize-winner Camilla Townsend on global history
itunes:subtitle: We speak to historian Camilla Townsend, who recently won the Cundill History Prize for her book Fifth Sun: A New History of the Aztecs
description:
Historian Camilla Townsend recently won the Cundill History Prize for Fifth Sun: A New History of the Aztecs. Here, she talks about the book’s success, and the challenges of writing global history for a popular audience.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
